reviewtext: Any Tivo is a huge improvement over regular television.This unit can easily be upgraded for more capacity.  I added an additional 80 gig drive without a hitch.Pausing live television is great.  I haven't used my VCR in over a year.  Tapes are a joke in comparison.Easy onscreen menus guide the set up of recording preferences.The Season Pass feature will record every episode for you!
summary: Tivo will dramatically change how you use TV
